abstracts.cdata!:
The Public Enterprise Reform Execution
            Loan Project, part of a program of Bank support to the
            Argentine Government's objectives of stabilizing its
            economy and resuming growth, will assist in: (a) the
            privatization/restructuring of public enterprises (PEs) in
            the telecommunications, railways and hydrocarbons sectors;
            and (ii) the better management of other PEs.
